name: Zola
content:
Zola was a Human female smuggler who lived during the Galactic Civil War.
Zola was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Zola was added to the game along with the smuggling missions introduced with the "Chapter 3" update, released on September 27, 2006.
